title: The developer shall be responsible for complete maintenance of the vacant tenements, till their allotments to eligible slum dwellers / S
clause_text: The developer shall be responsible for complete maintenance of the vacant tenements, till their allotments to eligible slum dwellers / S.R.A.
section: PAYMENTS TO BE MADE TO SRA AND INSTALMENTS :
